name: EVAC One: Subject #RandomNumber
description:
The aliens have invaded the space station! As the last remaining survivor, you must find the escape pods and save yourself. You don't have any weapons to fight with, so running is the only option. However, that does not mean you don't have some tricks up your sleeve...

The game randomly generates the station layout at each play through.

Game created for FPS Mini Jam #2. Submission contains executable files for Windows and Linux operating systems.
